Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Density - Greater than 2.40t/m3
○ Weathering Classification - AA, BA, AB or BB
○ Calcite intrusions - Rock shall be free of calcite intrusions
○ Grading - Rock for riprap shall be the nominal D50 size shown on the drawings and shall be well graded.
○ If riprap product is unavailable, alternative material to be approved by designer.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Mill & test certificates for each batch of reinforcement used to be provided to the Engineer. Unless specifically nominated otherwise on the Drawings, only Grade 500E reinforcement manufactured using the micro-alloyed process is acceptable.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Geotextile laid on base, GAP65/GAP100 compacted to 95% MDD and 20MPa blinding.
Verifying Document - IANZ Lab Test Report, Dockets
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - 1. All Panels & Baffle to be delivered to site seperately and assembled in-situ by the contractor.
2. Erect and Place Panels 3 & 4 to Panel 1 and Panel 2 with temporary supports, aligning projecting Reidbars through associated Drossbach ducts.
3. Tighten nuts equally at downstream end, using a socket wrench to a maximum torque of 200Nm, and fill ducts with grout.
4. Place Baffle and fit to Panels 1 & 2 with Reidbar starter bars fixed to couplers cast into Baffle ends.
5. Tie Base Slab reinforcing to projecting steel from Panels.
7. Fill swiftlift recessess with Sikagrout 212 or equivalent.
9. Contractor to ensure joints are suitably sealed to Engineer's/ Site specified requirements.
Standard / Specification - Shop Drawings - Site Installation Notes
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Riprap Mix Materials to be stockpiled separately and mixed in a pre-determined ratio.
○ Soil-riprap will contain 70% riprap mix and 30% topsoil.
○ Voids-filled riprap will contaon 70% riprap mix and 30% GAP40.
Verifying Document - Photographs, Riprap Mixing Inspections
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Reincorcing to be installed as per drawings.
Verifying Document - Prepour Inspection, Photos, Dockets, Mill certs
○ UCS testing with 1x7 days and 3x28 days cylinders.
Standard / Specification - Downer Drawings NZS3114, NZS3109
Verifying Document - Dockets, Testing Records, Pre-pour record
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Minimum Compaction 95%(Average 98%) of MDD or concrete fill beneath pipe.
Standard / Specification - Non cohesive material - Minimum Density Index (DI) of 70 or 95% of MDD AS/NZS 2566.2/2002
Verifying Document - IANZ Lab Test Report or Concrete Dockets
3.7 - Haunch Zone Compaction Testing - Haunch Zone shall extend from top of bedding to 0.3 times the outside dia of pipe
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - NDM Direct Transmission with a probe depth of 300mm
Standard / Specification - HS2 backfil Non cohesive material - Minimum Density Index (DI) of 60 or 92% of MDD AS/NZS 3725:2007
Verifying Document - IANZ Lab Test Report
3.8 - Side Zone Compaction Testing - Side Zone shall extend from top of Haunch Zone to 0.5 times the outside dia of pipe
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - NDM Direct Transmission with a probe depth of 300mm
Standard / Specification - HS2 backfil Non cohesive material - Minimum Density Index (DI) of 60 or 92% of MDD AS/NZS 3725:2007
Verifying Document - IANZ Lab Test Report
3.9 - Overlay Compaction Testing - Overlay zone shall extend from top of Side Zone to 600mm above the top of the pipe. One lifts of 300mm to be placed.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - NDM Direct Transmission with a probe depth of 300mm
Standard / Specification - HS2 backfil Non cohesive material - Minimum Density Index (DI) of 60 or 92% of MDD AS/NZS 3725:2007
Verifying Document - IANZ Lab Test Report
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Novaflo pipe with filter sock and no-fines concrete behind structure.
